/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Vehicles, including cars and motorcycles, are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their daily routines. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day.
